_description: Dance Connexions Business Information - Core business details

identity.name: Dance Connexions
identity.description: Premium dance studio offering professional space rentals and dance classes for all ages in Bandar Sunway, Petaling Jaya.
identity.mission: To provide accessible, professional dance spaces that empower movement artists, instructors, and enthusiasts to practice, create, and grow.

address.full: 21-2, Jalan PJS 11/2, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Subang Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia

directions.fromLDP: Exit at Sunway/PJS 11. Turn into Jalan PJS 11/2. We are on the 2nd floor above the row of shops.
directions.fromFederalHighway: Take the Sunway exit. Follow signs to Bandar Sunway. Navigate to Jalan PJS 11/2.
landmarks: Look for our signage on 2nd floor

afterHours.description: Free parking after office hours, weekends, and public holidays

parking.recommendation: For large groups, book during evening/weekend for free parking

general.description: Flexible hours from early morning to late midnight

bookings.description: Available 7 days a week based on availability
bookings.advanceBooking: Recommended at least 48 hours in advance

studioRentals.description: Hourly rental of professional dance studios

danceClasses.description: Regular dance classes for all ages and levels

workshops.description: Special workshops and masterclasses with guest instructors

changingFacilities.description: Separate changing rooms with basic amenities

policies.footwear: Proper dance or indoor footwear required. No outdoor shoes on dance floor.
policies.foodDrinks: No food or drinks on the dance floor. Water bottles must have secure lids.
policies.noise: Respect noise levels, especially during late hours. Music must end by midnight.
policies.supervision: Children under 12 must be supervised by an adult.
policies.damage: Renters are responsible for any damage during their booking.
